name: Die, Golf
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK game jam.

The Theme:  "Roll of the Dice".

A 3d Golf game, where the ball is a Die, and the power of your next stroke is determined by the value of your last roll of the Die.

Use the aerial view + shot prediction to nail trick shots and get a low score on the front nine of this new golfing experience!

---

WASD         to control the Launch Angle

Spacebar       to launch the Die

Left Mouse       to interact with Menus

---

Hope you enjoy!

~ Uthel
